championship_run.title: Championship Contender!
championship_run.subtitle: A Legitimate Title Threat
championship_run.description: Your roster construction was masterful. You built a championship-caliber team that balances star power with depth.

analysis.lakers: You maximized LeBron's remaining window. This Lakers team is built to compete for a title.
analysis.bucks: Giannis has the supporting cast he needs. Milwaukee is a legitimate championship threat.
analysis.spurs: You accelerated Wembanyama's timeline perfectly. The Spurs are back among the elite.

playoff_success.title: Playoff Bound!
playoff_success.subtitle: Mission Accomplished
playoff_success.description: You achieved the primary goal: building a playoff team while managing the budget responsibly.

analysis.lakers: The Lakers are back in the playoffs. You balanced LeBron's win-now pressure with financial prudence.
analysis.bucks: Giannis gets another playoff run. Your cap management kept the team competitive.
analysis.spurs: Wembanyama's first playoff experience! You built wisely around the young star.

savvy_gm.title: Savvy GM!
savvy_gm.subtitle: Smart Money Management
savvy_gm.description: You made the playoffs while keeping luxury tax payments minimal. Ownership loves you.

analysis.lakers: Playoffs AND financial stability? You've achieved the impossible in Los Angeles.
analysis.bucks: Smart cap management while keeping Giannis competitive. Excellent work.
analysis.spurs: Cap space preserved, playoffs achieved. The Spurs way continues.

big_spender.title: Big Spender!
big_spender.subtitle: Paid the Price for Success
big_spender.description: You made the playoffs, but the luxury tax bill is enormous. Hope ownership is patient.

analysis.lakers: The Lakers made the playoffs, but the tax bill is staggering. Championships justify everything... if you win.
analysis.bucks: Giannis is happy, but the accountants are not. This spending isn't sustainable.
analysis.spurs: Aggressive spending for a rebuilding team? Interesting strategy. It worked... barely.

development_win.title: Youth Movement Success!
development_win.subtitle: Built for the Future
development_win.description: You achieved playoff success while developing young talent. The future is bright.

analysis.lakers: Dalton Knecht and the young Lakers stepped up. The post-LeBron era looks promising.
analysis.bucks: AJ Johnson and Andre Jackson are ready for bigger roles. Giannis has future help.
analysis.spurs: Stephon Castle and Jeremy Sochan emerged. Wembanyama has his supporting cast.

budget_blown.title: Budget Blown!
budget_blown.subtitle: Financial Disaster
budget_blown.description: You exceeded the $150M budget limit. Ownership has lost patience. Your tenure ends.

analysis.lakers: The Buss family wanted wins, not bankruptcy. Your aggressive spending crossed the line.
analysis.bucks: Small market teams can't sustain this spending. Milwaukee's financial limits were clear.
analysis.spurs: The Spurs organization values stability. Your reckless spending violated their core principles.

missed_playoffs.title: Season Failure
missed_playoffs.subtitle: Missed the Playoffs
missed_playoffs.description: Despite staying under budget, you failed to reach the 46-win threshold for playoffs.

analysis.lakers: LeBron's window is closing. Wasting a season with a non-playoff team is unacceptable.
analysis.bucks: Giannis's prime is being squandered. He expected contention, not mediocrity.
analysis.spurs: Development is fine, but 46 wins was achievable. You were too conservative.

complete_disaster.title: Fired!
complete_disaster.subtitle: Total Failure
complete_disaster.description: You exceeded the budget AND missed the playoffs. Security is escorting you out.

analysis.lakers: Overspent and underperformed. The Lakers are a laughingstock. You're done in basketball.
analysis.bucks: You somehow spent a fortune and still missed playoffs. Giannis is demanding a trade.
analysis.spurs: Gregg Popovich would never. You've embarrassed the entire organization.

rebuild_mode.title: Development Year
rebuild_mode.subtitle: Building for Tomorrow
rebuild_mode.description: You stayed under budget but prioritized development over winning. Acceptable for young teams.

analysis.lakers: Development? With LeBron? This might not fly in Los Angeles, but the young players did grow.
analysis.bucks: Giannis isn't getting younger. This patient approach might cost you his prime.
analysis.spurs: Classic Spurs development approach. Wembanyama is progressing. Patience may pay off.
